references.paper_title: Textdiffuser: Diffusion models as text painters.
references.reason: This paper introduces TextDiffuser, a diffusion model that treats text as painters, which is highly relevant to the task of text rendering in images, especially because TextCrafter is compared with it.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models.
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models, the technique upon which the model is based for generation.
This paper introduces DiT model which TextCrafter is based on.

This is a seminal paper on denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), laying the groundwork for many subsequent advancements in the field of generative modeling, used in TextCrafter for image generation.
This paper presents a model capable of generating images from text descriptions, demonstrating how to achieve text to image generation.
